SEARCH
Package sc2002.models

Class User

java.lang.Object
sc2002.models.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the hospital system, with functionality for login, logout, and patient registration.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a User object with the specified hospital ID.

      public boolean logOut()
      Logs the user out of the system.
      Returns:

    • checkForExit

      public static boolean checkForExit(String exit)
      Checks if the user input is "EXIT" to terminate a process.
      Parameters:
      exit - The user input string.
      Returns:
      True if the input is "EXIT"; otherwise, false.

    • login

      public User login(Scanner scanner)
      Logs a user into the system by validating their credentials.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object for user input.
      Returns:
      The logged-in User object or null if login fails.

    • register

      public static void register(Scanner scanner)
      Registers a new patient in the hospital system.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object for user input.

    • digitChecker

      public static String digitChecker(Scanner scanner, int digits, int max)
      Validates numeric input based on length and range requirements.
      Parameters:
      scanner - The Scanner object for user input.
      digits - The required number of digits.
      max - The maximum value allowed (-1 for no max).
      Returns:
      The valid numeric input as a String.
